entry.title: How to setup Pentaho on MacOS BigSur

link.title: How to setup Pentaho on MacOS BigSur

entry.summary: I’ve struggled several hours trying to figure out how to get the pentaho data integration app running on my macOS BigSur 11.2.3. When I ran spoon.sh or spoon.command in the terminal, the interface will eventually show up for a second but then will crash immediately. I was finally able to get it to run with Eris’s method. It’s seems that we need to tell Pentaho application specifically where ...
